message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. It's a good deal for both of us.

I appreciate the offer, but I think we can do better.  Let's split it 60-40, with me getting the larger share.  After all, I'll be making the offer next round, so I figure you'll want to get a good deal this time!
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise a bit more. 55-45 is a fair deal, don't you think?
